org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

类 DefaultThreadContextStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.DefaultThreadContextStack
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Iterable<String>, Collection<String>, ThreadContextStack, ThreadContext.ContextStack, StringBuilderFormattable

    public class DefaultThreadContextStack
extends Object
implements ThreadContextStack, StringBuilderFormattable
    A copy-on-write thread-safe variant of org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ThreadContextStack in which all mutative operations (add, pop, and so on) are implemented by making a fresh copy of the underlying list.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • getImmutableStackOrNull

        public ThreadContext.ContextStack getImmutableStackOrNull()
        从接口复制的说明: ThreadContext.ContextStack
        Returns a ContextStack with the same contents as this ContextStack or null. Attempts to modify the returned stack may or may not throw an exception, but will not affect the contents of this ContextStack.
        指定者:
        getImmutableStackOrNull 在接口中 ThreadContext.ContextStack
        返回:
        a ContextStack with the same contents as this ContextStack or null.
